properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 3:09PM EST until March 4 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
seas 4 to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...South Santee River to Edisto Beach out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to midnight EST Tuesday night.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST TUESDAY NIGHT
